an4.254:2.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna parinneyya?
an4.254:2.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna parinneyya.
an4.254:3.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna pahatabba?
an4.254:3.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna pahatabba.
an4.254:4.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna bhavetabba?
an4.254:4.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna bhavetabba.
an4.254:5.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna sacchikatabba?
an4.254:5.3: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma abhinna sacchikatabba.
